title: C.D.&T, Over- Vaccinating, and Residue Contamination in Raw Milk
author: Riverwatch Farm LLC
description: C.D.&T. is a common vaccine given to goats to protect them against Clostridium perfringens Type C and D, as well as tetanus. While vaccination is an important aspect of goat health management, over-vaccinating can have p...
cleaned_text: Get a glimpse of life at Riverwatch Farm! We are a Micro Dairy & ADGA dairy goat breeder located in West Point, VA . We raise ADGA registered Nigerian Dwarf dairy goats and chickens. We run a herdshare program for those who want their own farm fresh milk and also sell fresh eggs, pet milk as well as a variety of other value added products. In 2020 we expanded our efforts and became a wholesale milk supplier to a local creamery. Copyright © 2023 Riverwatch Farm LLC - All Rights Reserved.
